nodes.text: The Sith Lord Darth Zhorrid of the Sith Empire maintained an estate on the planet Sernpidal. Between the various tasks given to her by her father Darth Jadus, Zhorrid returned to her estates on Sernpidal as well as the planets Dromund Kaas and Begeren, where she indulged in a variety of luxuries and horrors until she was ordered elsewhere.
Darth Zhorrid's estates were first mentioned in the Codex entry for the Sith Lord in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
